entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 near noon then increasing to 40 gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
